update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_hash = #{passwordHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_salt = #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, last_long_lat = #{lastLongLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
